m_szDocTitle: How inefficient are microprocessors? | Chips | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- How inefficient are microprocessors? Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Nvidia: virtual reality will take another 20 years to fix As regular Geek.com readers will know, I have recently purchased an AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core Processor. It's a 4400+ rated at 65 Watts. Now, when I read the sign on the front of the package which says “65w” I began thinking to myself: Here is a dual-core processor, one capable of doing two things at one time through two literal cores, a processor with virtualization
